body_html: @benoitsteiner Mainly on cudnn for pooling and convolution. I think that if every vendor will produce an API with its own hardware for this operations with its own binary assembly will not be a so scalable approach. That is why I think some performance crucial API calls would be better to be standardized in some way.

body: @benoitsteiner Mainly on cudnn for pooling and convolution. I think that if every vendor will produce an API with its own hardware for this operations with its own binary assembly will not be a so scalable approach. That is why I think some performance crucial API calls would be better to be standardized in some way.
